name: Superconductor
tagline: Parallel Web Programming for Massive Visualizations
body:
# Open Source Release in May 2013!

**Meet Us!**
* [O'Reilly Fluent](http://fluentconf.com/fluent2013/public/schedule/detail/27963) May 30th (San Francisco)
* [PLDI SRC](http://pldi2013.ucombinator.org/) June 17th (Seattle)
* [Strange Loop](https://thestrangeloop.com) September 18th-20th (St. Louis) 
* [IFIP Workshop on Language Design](http://program-transformation.org/WGLD/Aarhus2013) August 21st-25th (Aarhus, Denmark)

**Recent:**
* [Khronos WebCL Meetup / Game Developers Conference](https://www.khronos.org/news/events/march-meetup-2013) March 28 (San Francisco)

## Architecture

![System architecture](https://raw.github.com/Superconductor/Superconductor/master/www/arch.png)
